attributes.review: This app crashed my phone as soon as I opened it. My phone was lagging for 1 hour. I had to restart my phone and it was so stressful and a waste of time. This app is dangerous and should NEVER have been put on the App Store. Please take it down immediately. Thank you
attributes.title: WORST APP EVER

attributes.review:
this app took a very long time to download then after i kept getting spammed from the app saying “text trump to 8802” or whatever the number is and then after a few days of having the app it gave me 10 viruses and made me get a whole new phone. DONT DOWNLOAD THIS APP FOR UR PHONES SAFETY 

𝚏𝚞𝚌𝚔 𝚞 𝚝𝚛𝚞𝚖𝚙 .
attributes.title: DONT DOWNLOAD

attributes.review: This is one of the worst apps i have ever had. It took several hours to download and all i wanted to do was support my orange president. The app wouldn’t stop glitching and had stolen my credit card information. It didn’t even make america great again😤
attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD

attributes.review: When I got the app it was asking me so many useless questions. Like what’s my favorite color, also if i support trump and if i’m underage. Like it’s so weird. Anyways besides that it also took 2 weeks to download. I would not recommend!!
attributes.title: trash

attributes.review: This app has been terrible from day 1. Literally just want to support the first orange president #cheetoman2020 and the app just completely wiped all other apps from my phone. I guess the app is appist or something, but I ain’t with all that appism and appicide crap so it’s got to go.
attributes.title: Most Appist App ever

attributes.review: This app truly sucked, it took me so long to get it downloaded and when I finally opened it all I could see when I looked at Donald Trump’s face was the words racist, misogynistic and homophobic. 10/10 would not recommend, think something’s broken. KANYE 2020.

Okay so first of all this app is buttcheek and it’s horrible. It took forever to download I been waiting since the first election in 2016. I was waiting so long for it to load till point my pet lobster Larry missed his walks for 4 YEARS.🤬🤬😡😡😡😡😔😣😣😫😫😫😭😭😭
attributes.title: I hate this app more than I hate my life

attributes.review: this app is horrendous and i would not recommend to any person who is looking to gain information on the trump campaign. donald john trump does not share any political plans on the app rather just puts slipshod posts about absolutely nothing relevant just like his twitter. i would also like to point out that the apps interface is terrible and difficult to use. i also feel that this app infringes on my rights as a free person in america. go back to the bunker and fix this app.
attributes.title: horrid.

attributes.review:
After consideration into voting for Donald Trump,
my wife decided to leave me for someone who knows RESPECTS human rights unlike Donald trump. Anyway, Im not voting now and I lost my wife. So I guess I’m left with nothing 😔. If Donald trump sees this, I will vote for him. Because I have nothing else anymore in this world 😔.
attributes.title: This App Ruined My 5 Year Marriage

attributes.review: Legit have never seen an app with worse qualities or anything. Since you can’t write a review without having downloaded the app I did and I didn’t even have to open it to see that this app is the worst app out there by far...
attributes.title: Worst app ever
